rules_json.S:
{
  "id": "ACME",
  "client_name": "ACME",
  "version": 1,
  "targetSpecDivisions": [
    "06",
    "07",
    "05"
  ],
  "targetPlanSections": [
    "exterior elevations",
    "building elevations"
  ],
  "enrichmentRules": [
    {
      "ruleId": "ACMETrim",
      "ruleName": "ACME Trim",
      "ruleType": "substitution",
      "ruleMechanism": "fuzzymatch",
      "ruleTermSets": [
        {
          "name": "Client Product Terms",
          "type": "client_product",
          "terms": [
            {
              "term": "ACME",
              "description": "ACME Building Products is our client",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": null
            },
            {
              "term": "Paint.{0,1}Ready",
              "description": "ACME PaintReadyTrim is a high-performance trim product from ACME Building Products.",
              "override_mechanism": "regex",
              "additional_context": null
            },
            {
              "term": "ReadyToPaint Trim",
              "description": "ACME PaintReadyTrim is a high-performance trim product from ACME Building Products.",
              "override_mechanism": null,
              "additional_context": null
            }
          ],
          "products": []
        },
        {
          "name": "Competitor Product Terms",
          "type": "competitor_product",
          "terms": [
            {
              "term": "AZEK",
              "description": "AZEK refers to AZEK building products, a competitor of ACME.",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": null
            },
            {
              "term": "James Hardie",
              "description": "James Hardie refers to James Hardie Building Products, a competitor of ACME",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": null
            },
            {
              "term": "Boral",
              "description": "Boral is a trim manufacturer that is a competitor to ACME",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": null
            },
            {
              "term": "Certainteed",
              "description": "Certainteed is a trim manufacturer that is a competitor to ACME.",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": null
            },
            {
              "term": "Hardie Building",
              "description": "Refers to James Hardie Building Products, a competitor of ACME",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": null
            }
          ],
          "products": [
            {
              "term": "Certainteed Restoration",
              "description": "Certainteed delivers a comprehensive exterior solution that marries timeless charm with modern durability. Its Restoration siding revives classic exteriors with a factory‐applied finish that ensures consistent color, texture, and enduring resistance to harsh weather, fading, and wear—perfect for revitalizing historic homes with contemporary reliability. Complementing this, Certainteed Certatrim offers precision detailing with a clean, crisp profile engineered to resist moisture, rot, and fading, enhancing architectural features with effortless elegance. Together, these products create a cohesive, low-maintenance exterior that stands up to the elements while celebrating authentic style and lasting performance.",
              "override_mechanism": null,
              "additional_context": "ACME Trim is a Direct Substitution for this product"
            },
            {
              "term": "Certatrim",
              "description": "Certainteed delivers a comprehensive exterior solution that marries timeless charm with modern durability. Its Restoration siding revives classic exteriors with a factory‐applied finish that ensures consistent color, texture, and enduring resistance to harsh weather, fading, and wear—perfect for revitalizing historic homes with contemporary reliability. Complementing this, Certainteed Certatrim offers precision detailing with a clean, crisp profile engineered to resist moisture, rot, and fading, enhancing architectural features with effortless elegance. Together, these products create a cohesive, low-maintenance exterior that stands up to the elements while celebrating authentic style and lasting performance.",
              "override_mechanism": "exactmatch",
              "additional_context": "ACME Trim is a Direct Substitution for this product"
            },
            {
              "term": "Tru[\\s-]{0,1}Exterior",
              "description": "Boral TruExterior is engineered to offer a sleek, modern exterior finish that outperforms traditional siding. Manufactured with advanced composite technology, it provides exceptional durability, moisture resistance, and a maintenance‐free surface. Its streamlined design and ease of installation make it an ideal choice for projects where lasting beauty and efficient performance are paramount.",
              "override_mechanism": "regex",
              "additional_context": "ACME Trim is a Direct Substitution for this product"
            },
            {
              "term": "James Hardie Smooth",
              "description": "James Hardie offers a versatile range of fiber cement siding solutions that blend traditional charm with contemporary sophistication. The Rustic finish captures the natural allure of classic materials through a textured, authentic look designed to resist weathering, impact, and fading, creating a warm, inviting aesthetic. Meanwhile, the Smooth finish delivers a streamlined, modern appearance with a flawless, clean finish that resists cracking, moisture, and fading, emphasizing sleek architectural lines. Together, these low-maintenance systems embody the durability and lasting performance ideal for exteriors that celebrate both enduring character and modern design.",
              "override_mechanism": null,
              "additional_context": "ACME Trim is a Direct Substitution for this product"
            },
            {
              "term": "James Hardie Rustic",
              "description": "James Hardie offers a versatile range of fiber cement siding solutions that blend traditional charm with contemporary sophistication. The Rustic finish captures the natural allure of classic materials through a textured, authentic look designed to resist weathering, impact, and fading, creating a warm, inviting aesthetic. Meanwhile, the Smooth finish delivers a streamlined, modern appearance with a flawless, clean finish that resists cracking, moisture, and fading, emphasizing sleek architectural lines. Together, these low-maintenance systems embody the durability and lasting performance ideal for exteriors that celebrate both enduring character and modern design.",
              "override_mechanism": null,
              "additional_context": "ACME Trim is a Direct Substitution for this product"
            },
            {
              "term": "PaintPro Trim",
              "description": "AZEK PaintPro Trim is engineered from advanced polymer technology to deliver premium exterior trim that endures.",
              "override_mechanism": null,
              "additional_context": "ACME Trim is a Direct Substitution for this product"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "clientProductKey": "ACME Trim",
      "clientProductDescription": "ACME Trim is a cellular PVC trim board engineered for superior paint adhesion with no sanding or priming required, offering moisture resistance and durability for exterior applications.",
      "productProfile": {
        "primaryApplication": "exterior trim and finishing elements",
        "applicationCategory": "building envelope trim",
        "installationLocations": [
          "corner boards",
          "soffits",
          "fascia",
          "door trim",
          "window trim",
          "frieze boards",
          "rake boards",
          "water tables",
          "band boards",
          "wainscoting",
          "pergolas",
          "column wraps",
          "skirtboards",
          "battens",
          "exterior millwork"
        ],
        "materialTypes": [
          "cellular PVC",
          "free foam PVC",
          "polyvinyl chloride",
          "synthetic trim",
          "non-wood polymer"
        ],
        "validCSIDivisions": [
          "06"
        ],
        "contextKeywords": {
          "required": [],
          "positive": [
            "paint ready",
            "no prime",
            "paint adhesion",
            "exterior trim",
            "PVC trim",
            "moisture resistant",
            "rot resistant",
            "cellular PVC",
            "synthetic trim",
            "dark color",
            "vinyl safe paint",
            "LRV",
            "light reflective value"
          ],
          "negative": [
            "structural",
            "load bearing",
            "interior only",
            "unpaintable",
            "natural wood",
            "fiber cement trim",
            "metal trim",
            "composite decking"
          ]
        }
      },
      "planExtractionPrompt": "The trim installation/requirement location is typically found on an elevation view.  It will sometimes be specifically called out as trim.  Try to correlate the description of the architectural document with the product application location details in the specification document and summary.",
      "additionalLlmPrompt": "## Important:  \n* The product we are evaluating is ACME Trim which is a cellular PVC trim that can be proposed as a substitute to other PVC trim products.  This is NOT a siding based product and does not replace siding or fiber-cement siding applications.   Make sure that there is a specific mention of a TRIM based solution in the specs.\n\n* If you are suggesting more than one opportunity for this ACME Trim product, make sure to verify these are 2 distinct trim opportunities called out within the same project.  If you are recommending multiple opportunties, you must give reasoning in your TextSummary output for each opportunity why you deem this a unique structure/application of this product."
    },
    {
      "ruleId": "ACMESiding",

      "clientProductDescription": "ACME Siding is a capped polymer/cellular PVC siding system offering superior moisture resistance, durability, and authentic wood aesthetics without maintenance requirements",

      "planExtractionPrompt": "The siding installation/requirement location is typically found on an elevation view.  It will sometimes be specifically called out.  Try to correlate the description of the architectural document with the product application location details in the specification document and summary.",
      "additionalLlmPrompt": "Important:  The product we are evaluating is ACME Siding which is a cellular PVC siding that can be proposed as a substitute to other PVC siding products or fiber cement siding (often referred to as HardieBoard).  This is NOT a trim based product and is not a substitute for trim or trimboards.\n\nIf you are suggesting more than one opportunity for this ACME Siding product, make sure to verify these are 2 distinct siding opportunities called out within the same project."
    },
    {

            {
              "term": "AZEK Cladding",
              "description": "AZEK Cladding is engineered with advanced polymer technology to deliver a long‐lasting, low‐maintenance cladding solution that mimics the natural beauty of wood. Designed for both open‐joint and closed‐joint applications, this product offers superior resistance to moisture, fading, and weathering, providing an authentic wood‐like appearance without the upkeep.     {
      "ruleId": "ACMERapidRailing",
      "ruleName": "ACME Rapid Railing",
      "ruleType": "substitution",
      "ruleMechanism": "fuzzymatch",
      "ruleTermSets": [
        {

            {

          "products": [
            {
              "term": "Trex Signature Rail",
              "description": "Trex Signature Metal Railing offers an elevated, modern solution for outdoor spaces that combines sleek design with lasting durability. Crafted from premium, powder‐coated aluminum, its low-maintenance construction resists fading, corrosion, and harsh weather—ensuring that your deck maintains its refined look year after year.",
              "override_mechanism": "fuzzymatch",
              "additional_context": "ACME Rapid Railing is a direct substitution for this product"
            },
            {
              "term": "Fiberon HavenView Railing",
              "description": "Fiberon HavenView Railing is a railing product made by Fiberon.",
              "override_mechanism": "fuzzymatch",

            {
              "term": "AZEK Impression Railing Express",
              "description": "AZEK Impression Railing Express is a premium metal railing system engineered for superior durability and a classic, wrought-iron-inspired aesthetic. Manufactured with high-performance powder-coated aluminum, this system is designed for easy, rattle-free installation and offers a sleek, unobtrusive profile that maximizes sightlines. Ideal for both residential and commercial projects, it delivers low maintenance, weather resistance, and is backed by a 25-year limited warranty.",
              "override_mechanism": "fuzzymatch",
              "additional_context": "ACME Rapid Railing is a direct substitution for this product"
            }
          ]

      "clientProductKey": "ACME Rapid Railing",
      "clientProductDescription": "ACME Rapid Railing: Lasting Beauty, Installed in a Snap.Upgrade your property with ACME Rapid Railing, the smart choice for enduring style and easy installation. This premium metal system features high-performance powder-coated aluminum, delivering the timeless aesthetic of wrought iron with superior durability and weather resistance. Designed for a straightforward, rattle-free setup, its sleek profile enhances sightlines. Enjoy low-maintenance beauty for years to come in any residential or commercial setting, all secured by a 25-year limited warranty.",
